trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Weed
There were no other sightings in Weed on or around November 10th 1980
divs: Sighting Details1. I was in my house with my sister and I was in the bathroom and heard her scream 2.after the screams, I noticed a glow from outside and went to see what it was 3. I was sure it was something I have never seen no noise hovering 20 ft over my head 4.the size of a VW bug, hovering over a tree in my backyard glowing 5. Excited,scared 6. It was over me For an unknown amount of time, it left sooooo fast towards mt Shasta that was about 20 miles away and left a streak of light and was 20 miles away within seconds.
